description: TRESemmé SHAMPOO REPAIR & PROTECT 7 350 ML  Need to do some damage control? There’s more to take on than just heat. For brittle hair, use TRESemme´ Repair and Protect 7 Shampoo, our most powerful repairing system yet, to counteract seven—yes seven—types of styling damage: bleaching, braiding, curling, brushing, coloring, blowdrying and straightening.Formulated with Biotin Complex, the system instantly treats visible damage to your hair and helps repair damaged hair fiber from within. That means you’ll walk out of the shower with visibly stronger, healthier, and more manageable hair that’s style-ready.WHY REPAIR & PROTECT 7?You can blow-dry, brush & braid. You can bleach, colour, straighten & curl. Healthy hair or smooth style? Have both. VISIBLY REPAIR 7 TYPES OF STYLING DAMAGE IN 1 USE^> BLOW DRYING > STRAIGHTENING> COLOURING > CURLING> BLEACHING> BRUSHING > BRAIDINGOur Repair & Protect 7 system^, with BIOTIN COMPLEX, visibly repairs styling damage and with continued use, strengthens each strand inside and out*. Hair will be protected so you can keep styling.^TRESemmé Repair & Protect 7 Shampoo & Conditioner vs non-conditioning shampoo*Less breakageNEED AN EXTRA BOOST OF PROTECTION?Follow with our Repair & Protect 7 Conditioner to maximise results. For added damage protection use the Repair & Protect 7 Instant Recovery Mask..OUR PHILOSOPHYFrom our origins in Salons in 1948, TRESemmé has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look & feel fabulous, like they've just stepped out of the salonTRESemmé is dedicated to creating haircare products that are salon quality. Inspired by stylist and salons, the products are designed to help you achieve salon gorgeous hair every day.TRESemmé. Professional. At your fingertips.Goes Well With: TRESemmé Repair & Protect 7 Conditioner  Repair & Protect 7 - now With Biotin Complex  Work to Counteract seven types of styling damage: bleaching, braiding, curling, brushing. Coloring, blow drying and straightening  Specially formulated for brittle hair  Biotin Complex work in the system to treats visible damage from within  to give you style ready hair that is visibly stronger and healthier  Use it together with TRESemmé  Repair & Protect 7 Shampoo for best result
name: Tresemme Shampoo Repair & Protect 350ml
